column4: hello, i try to enable my 12' touchscreen  with ubuntu 9.10 as a new feature. but is is not working like that, the touchscreen module is usb based, from gtouch and after pluging the usb in i get a /dev/usb/hiddev0
if i cat as root /dev/usb/hiddev0 and rubb the screen i get cray signs
does anyone know how to enable this device
you may have to add a new input entry to the xorg.conf  - but im just guessing.
